attributes.additional_details: Reason of this is government delayed in responding to Carina, Their is history countries responded late to epidemic , had higher mortality rate.
attributes.background: Kindly advice all transport to start sanitizing , why UK could  not learn in advance for prevention of corona from.Singapore ?

rejection.details:
Responsibility for public transport is devolved to local councils or Mayors, and national public transport is the responsibility of individual transport operators.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
